personal_info.name: Vatsal Jaganwala
personal_info.title: Associate Flutter Developer
personal_info.profile_summary: Associate Flutter Developer at Instance IT Solutions, experienced in developing cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter with state management (Getx, BLoC). Experienced in working with solutions such as Firebase, REST APIs, etc, for scalable, responsive solutions. Strong problem-solving and teamwork skills with a focus on agile practices, continuous learning, and delivering high-quality results for clients.

experience.title: Associate Flutter Developer
responsibilities: Experienced in cross-platform development like Android, iOS and web
Participated in the full software development life cycle (SDLC) from requirements gathering through system implementation
Implemented agile development practices across multiple projects, ensuring the timely delivery of high-quality solutions within constraints
Focused on learning new skills and staying updated with industry changes
Strong analytical, research, and problem-solving skills for innovative client solutions

education.degree: Bachelor in Engineering in Information Technology
education.institution: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Institute of Technology, Vasad, Anand

awards.title: Silent Achiever
awards.description: Received the 'Silent Achiever' Award at Instance IT Solutions in recognition of consistently delivering excellent results and high-quality work.

awards.title: On The Spot Award
awards.description: Received the 'On The Spot' Award for outstanding dedication and hard work at Instance IT Solutions.

projects.title: B-Creamy
projects.description: Designed and developed a cross-platform business management system for a food and beverage brand offering a diverse range of products. The solution included modules for inventory control, production tracking, and point-of-sale (POS) integration, supporting both operational and customer-facing processes. Focused on streamlining day-to-day business activities, the app enabled real-time monitoring of stock and production, efficient order handling, and smooth B2C transactions through a custom POS interface. The application helped improve operational efficiency, reduce manual workload, and enhance overall customer experience.

projects.title: Prestige PRENEW
projects.description: Developed "Prestige PRENEW" for Prestige Group of Construction to manage rehabilitation projects, with a focus on tracking hutment details, demolition, and relocation. Automated the generation of essential documents for all project phases, improving accuracy and reducing manual effort. Designed a robust geo-referencing module that enabled DWG (AutoCAD) plan uploads, automatic detection of drawing elements, and interactive plotting on a geo map. This provided project teams with advanced visualisation and efficient decision-making tools.

projects.title: PREOSS: Parking Management
projects.description: Developed "PREOSS: Parking Management," a platform for "Prestige Group of Construction", designed to visualise parking plan DWG files and extract parking inventory. The system enables real-time allocation of parking spaces, retrieves data on parking types and conveniences, and provides an auto-allocation feature that matches parking slots to flat units based on user-defined algorithms. Personally handled all visualisation tasks, ensuring interactive and seamless plan representation for user operations.

projects.title: Godrej Living App
projects.description: Developed the "Godrej Living App" for Godrej Properties to manage post-sale apartment activities and community operations for residential societies. The app enables efficient handling of resident engagement, event and notice broadcasts, guest in/out tracking, and parcel management within housing societies. The platform serves as a centralised community portal, allowing residents and management teams to stay connected and streamline communication and daily operations.
